label: MQTT_Subscribe_CatSymbol
info:
Subscribes to classify/cat and colorizes the cat-svg according to the status:
- nothing: no color changes
- spotted: cat changes to orange
- mouse: cat changes to red

label: MQTT_Publish_WeatherData
info:
gets weatherdata from owm-api every minute
formats it 
publishes data to 3 topics
- weather/current
- weather/hourly
- weather/daily

label: MQTT_Subscribe_WeatherData
info:
subscribes 3 topics:
- weather/current
- weather/hourly
- weather/daily

publishes their content to the weather-dashboard

subscribes to classify/allLog and displays the detected objects from the last 5 logs. Shows percentage and object-name of the 3 objects with the highest percentage incl. timestamp
